thread.title: Did Dinosaurs and Humans Ever Live Together?
thread.title_full: Did Dinosaurs and Humans Ever Live Together?

author: Hemant Mehta
title: Did Dinosaurs and Humans Ever Live Together?
text:
March 7, 2017 by Hemant Mehta Leave a Comment 
Did dinosaurs and humans ever live together at the same time? 
Outside The Flintstones and the exhibits at the Creation Museum, the answer is an obvious no. This video from the folks at Stated Clearly does a really nice job of explaining why that overlap never happened — and how we know that. 
It’s almost like all the evidence we have available to us points away from humans and dinosaurs living simultaneously… 
Can someone send this to Ken Ham ?
